nodes.title: #povertysNOTillegal
nodes.description: Hi all, I just wanted to reach out to let you know we’ve just passed 100 signatures on our petition! Thank you so much for your support! Will you help me to get more support by sharing this petition with ten other people? If enough of us sign we can’t be ignored! Here’s a link to share https://www.change.org/p/our-children-should-have-rights-you-say-we-all-have-rights-if-so-why-dont-you-stand-on-them-why-cant-a-parent-stand-for-thier-child-s

nodes.title: Still no visits please share!!
nodes.description:
They tried to take him in court today.. It was rather funny when the judge realized im not just some drug addict that dont care..  That ive been doing quite well even have my oun company and yet dont have my son... DFS worker started stuttering when she realized shed just been caught in a lie.... 

The judge stopped court and set it for friday 

I miss my aon i havent got to hug him since before the shut down..... You can see here how much he misses me

nodes.title: Kidnapped and locked away
nodes.description: Since the coronavirus i havent seen my son .. Please share please help me collect signatures i miss my baby i fear ill never see him again

nodes.title: Theyve become UNCONSTITUTIONAL
nodes.description: Since the virus we i am not aloud to see eachother except through video chat .. He hates it ... Why cant they just let me have him ... I HAVE A HOME.. idk how temperary its going to be with the shut down of everything how am i supposed to pay rent when i have to stay at home?? None of this is fair or right!! This is his attitude on video chat ... How is this healthy to his mind?

nodes.title: Progression not yet success
nodes.description:
We get closer everyday yet we still have one major rod block! They call my housing inadequate. Because its considered transient housing.. I live and work here.. What could be more stable than that? 

So here i am a felon with previous evictions and low income trying to find stable housing in a city over populated with homeless that all need the same. And a system too corrupt to even process my paperwork but sure say they did. 

My christmas wish..... A home

nodes.title: Just had adjudication hearing
nodes.description:
Thank you to all that have signed please continue to share!!

i wish i felt like it mattered what i do .. At this point after everything i know and all that it is ...though it seems lost... But everyday i fight anyways

. Judge took adjudication. But said we'll talk ab sandwich visits in december .had nothing but positive things to say and treated me as if i were somewhat human.. I stipulated the terms with adjustment to some words. ..and agreed to disagree it was as close to right as they wanted it to be.. 

I am hopeful the positivity i see isn't some more corrupt bullshit.

... Been clean.. Job.. Work for room at motel.. Stable-ish. .... definitely better since it fell.. Worker finally trying to give resources i coulda been utilizing

I don't know if its my voice that's affecting outlook.. but either way I'm going to speak louder every day..

nodes.title: Finally IN HOME visits
nodes.description: Thank you to all that have signed please share!!

nodes.title: More attempts at injustice!
nodes.description:
So my usual UA lady is out on maternity leave. So they signed me with this GUY. And they called me last week so I called the supervisor to find out what I'm supposed to do cuz my girls on leave he says " this guy will be filling in for her we have to do this today are you available?" ..." of course here's my work address call me when you get here or we can schedule a time" .... He replies " what time does your girl usually do it?"... " between 6 and 8 depends on what time I get done working" ...he said " ok ill give him the info expect him between 6 and 8. Ill have him call you now so you have his number" ... Nothing for hours so i call back.. Get his number.. Calling "i cant do it today. Ill be there sunday." He declared.... And assured me its on him not me... So i call the supervisor back and make sure hes aware... Again assures me its on them not me... 

Sunday comes no call/answer. No show.... On him

Monday morning he texts me. I said "heres my work address CALL  me whe you get here because i could be in any room." . .he says hell be btween 5:30 and 6.... At 4 he says "im done early i can come now" my irritated but polite response "i wanna finish the job i am almost done" he sas "im at Chipotle text me when youre ready" .....i text "20 min room 411"

Im waiting..............wtf so i look at my phone.... 

"Im here" 2 min ago

"Im out i got other clients" 1 min ago

No unusual cars outside

/#÷/×/\$\!/÷/+*€×€+*\×/÷\=*÷£×€×*×&÷*÷£(excuse my language)

So i call the company ... Yay its after 5pm .. No answer

So i call my girl... He came right back

I pee he says there's no line i about snap!! "IDF THINK SO I AINT DONE NO DAMN DRUGS GIVE ME ANOTHER CUP" so he did... It was ALL NEGATIVE 

I set the cups side by side and take picture. Send them to my girl. And call her. She says "he better have put that as a negative!" I state "he did and being the last 2 cups i done with you the line stops half way and there is no line we both seen it now this y'all. Gotta fix your cups. How many sittin on false positives right now???" Dude tried to argue a little about how they cant be faulty .... I laughed then gotta hell of an attitude "I MANUFACTURED URINE ANALYSIS CUPS FOR INTEGRITY I WAS A MACHINE AND LINE OPERATOR I KNOW ALL ABOUT THESE CUPS AND THEY'RE DEFAULTS!!!" you are required to wear gloves while handling the cups or any of its materials because; say if someone decides on lunch to go do a bump and touched they're dope to do so... Don't wear gloves .. Touches cup. ....contaminated... The only person who is at fault for it is the guy who has to piss in it

nodes.title: 10 hours a week
nodes.description:
10 hours is all they allow me of my son a week. Supervised.  I make the best of it and he loves every minute of it whether were at McDonalds for hours with people staring at me like im nuts because i made a tunnel for his hotwheels out of number cards or at cool crest having a blast ... Hes good at picking machines to win. 

Even so supervised?  10 hours? And thats only if my parent aid has the time. I dont think they have yet to give me a full 10 hours!
